Package shaharas

Class BaseOperators

java.lang.Object
shaharas.BaseOperators
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operators
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseBinaryOperators, BaseUnaryOperators
abstract class BaseOperators extends Object implements Operators
The BaseOperators class serves as an abstract base class for all operator classes in the system. It provides common functionality that applies to all operators, including managing operands, operator symbols, regex patterns, and priorities. Specific operator behaviors (such as calculation and cloning) are left to be implemented by subclasses.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseOperators

      public BaseOperators(int a, Pattern regex, String symbol, int priority)
      Constructor to initialize the operator with the specified operand, regex pattern, symbol, and priority.
      Parameters:
      a - the operand of the operator
      regex - the regular expression that matches the operator symbol
      symbol - the symbol representing the operator (e.g., "+", "-", "*", etc.)
      priority - the priority of the operator (used for operator precedence)
